name: thinkcircle
tag_list: advertising-and-branding, design, interior, graphics, apparel, event-management, stationery-design, logo-design, web-design, software-applications
overview:
We have been working as a qualified professionals for the last 13 years. In this time, We have worked on many design projects for clients ranging from huge corporations to small organizations from UK, USA, UAE and other European countries.Our network is worldwide. There is absolutely no compromise on quality. We take the time to fully understand your needs and goals, and always create a design for you that communications on all levels. We helping you develop an integrated design and marketing strategies. We are working for all size business in the world with Online Transfer or Western Union,Easy paisa( only for Pakistan customers) or bank checks for your payment options, so you can pay fast & easily.

We are Looking for online and offline projects.

Can design & develop: • Initial and Complete Brand Campaigns • Electronic media( radio and tvcs ,cable ads) • Website design and development • Photo Shoots.( from still to videography) • Multimedia /Video Productions. • Out door Media(events to marketing campaigns) • Vehicles art work, • Product & packing design • Medals & Souveniors. • Event Design Management . • Apparel & Accessories(design and printing). • Finearts (paintings & others medium). • Interior and architectural design or services.

Also Provide Printing and Publishing services at nominal rates if required.

You can directly Contact us @: E: mail.thinkcircle@gmail.com P:92(0)3464689143 Portfolio:http://www.​​​​behance.net/thinkcircle
